name: Rwd-iframe
tagline: Demonstration of combining Responsive Webdesign and a Iframe with a responsive table
body:
#Demonstration of combining Responsive Webdesign anf Iframe 
On this page I will demonstrate how to put a  iframe containing a responsive table, to see if how they both react.
Note: for this to work, you will have either load in an iframe containing a table that is already responsive, or be in control of that iframe yourself.

##Demonstration 

A demo can found here: [RWD-iframe](http://johanbijlsma.atwebpages.com/RWD-iframe/)

###How this works

Basically this works quite simple. By adding a few media queries to both the html page
